text: Francis Lastic (born 3 February 1972) is an international football player from Saint Lucia, who plays as a defender, and coach currently working as a manager for Saint Lucia. ==Career== He made his international debut for Saint Lucia in 1996 and has appeared in FIFA World Cup qualifying matches. ==Coaching career== He coaches the Saint Lucia national football team. ==References== ==External links== * Profile at Scoresway Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Northern United All Stars players Category:Saint Lucian footballers Category:Saint Lucia international footballers Category:Saint Lucian football managers Category:Saint Lucia national football team managers Category:Association football defenders
title: Francis Lastic
